name: Coyote Hex
description:
Inspired by Castlevania, Mega-Man and Shovel Knight I started working on Coyote Hex, using it as an avenue to work on making sprite art with stricter limitations and focus my work. I ran into some serious burn out while working on this one but the demo has 2 of the 6 levels I planned to make in it and I'll be returning to this one too.
Like you know, probably.
